title: WTB T213, T215 NY American Player
author: TistaT202

posts.post_title: WTB T213, T215 NY American Player
posts.post_content:
I have a few extra bucks in my pocket thanks to winning the last Net54 baseball contest and I am looking to buy a low grade example of one of the cards listed below.  If you have one you want to part with shoot me an email at [url]mcantista@gmail.com[/url] or PM with scans and price. Thanks, Mike

want list:

T213-1

Hal Chase - Portrait
Hal Chase - Throwing
Birdie Cree

T213-2

Frank Home Run Baker
Frank Chance - Portrait 
Frank Chance - batting
Bill Donovan
Joe Kelley
Germany Schaefer
Edward Sweeney

T215-1 or T215-2

I don't have any of the NY Americans so any will do.
